content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5)

This setup extracts iron ore and processes it into iron plates. The mining drill extracts iron ore, which is stored in the wooden chest. The inserter moves the ore from the chest to the furnace, where it is smelted into iron plates.

### Coal Processing and Storage Facility at Position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)

This setup extracts coal and processes it. The mining drill extracts coal, which is stored in the wooden chest. The inserter moves coal from the chest to the furnace for further processing.

### Additional Furnaces
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0)

These furnaces are set up for additional smelting capacity but currently have no ingredients to process.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors Due to Insufficient Inventory
- Ensure you have enough resources in your inventory before attempting to insert items into entities. This will prevent errors related to insufficient materials when trying to insert items into furnaces or other structures.

### Errors with Full Chests
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to avoid halting production processes. This will ensure that mining drills and other entities can continue to operate without interruption.

### Errors with No Ingredients to Smelt
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to process. Regularly supply furnaces with the required materials to maintain continuous production.

By addressing these errors, the agent can improve efficiency and maintain smoother operations within the game.
